item.title: The journey to dotfiles ZEN
item.description: The problem with dotfiles As a new developer you will learn that using the cli will mean that you have to deal with what’s called dotfiles which are usually used as configuration files. The name dotfiles come from the fact that these files names start with a dot eg: .zshrc which makes them hidden by default in file explorers. It’s simple enough at first but problems starts to rise when you are forced to use multiple devices and want to keep your dotfiles synced between them.
